summary: A divorced father picks up his eight-year-old daughter Lea. It seems pretty much like every second weekend, but after a while Lea can't help feeling that something isn't right. So begins a fateful journey.

keywords: father kidnaps daughter|daughter|father|brushing teeth|kidnapped by father
title: Alles wird gut
